name: C.O.O.T.S Factory
description:
Welcome to C.O.O.T.S Factory!

This is where we create the Content Optimization Organism That Scratches (C.O.O.T.S), used by content creators across to world to lift their view count. C.O.O.T.S are the next level of A.I. powered feline content generation!

Here at C.O.O.T.S Factory you will be tasked with sorting C.O.O.T.S to their appropriate location, while also trying to keep our A.I. foreman, CatGPT happy.

How To Play

Drag devices from the top panel in order to build paths for C.O.O.T.S to get to their appropriate locations.

Credits

Developed by Erik Kirshey in 10 days for LudwigJam 2023

Music:

Plug by EZduzziteh

8-bit Victory Loop by Wolfgang

Great Boss by Spring Spring
